experience.description: Created and effectively managed University Immigration Services web platform that served as one stop shop for students and staff to provide services using HTML, CSS, and JS in Slate that helped to resolve student queries 40% faster.

Completed an intensive 4-month internship, standing out as the top performer among 60 peers. Selected as one of the five from 5000 applicants, I achieved mastery in Git, MongoDB, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Java, Spring, and React.js

Boosted client’s productivity by 30% by designing a B2B web application with React.js and Redux. Identified web-based user interactions, crafted frontend architecture, drafted user stories, and constructed the application in Agile Environment. Received Super Team Award for 2021-H2, representing the excellence and efficiency of the team

projects.pDescription: Successfully implemented a substantial enhancement, resulting in an impressive 80% increase in operational speed and a remarkable 100% improvement in accuracy over manual processes. The Full-Stack web-application tool became a valuable asset for the Enrolment Operations office.

Designed and developed a Full-Stack Web Application individually from scratch with React.js, Spring, Mongo DB, Tailwind CSS, Neumorphism UI. The application supports Micro-service-based architecture, Authentication, Authorization. Grab’n’Go is a one-stop shop for deals and coupons all over the internet, e-commerce web application.
